name: Curve RAI+3Crv Pool
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and RAI. Please be aware that as RAI is not pegged to $1, this pool may be subject to impermanent loss.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and RAI. Please be aware that as RAI is not pegged to $1, this pool may be subject to impermanent loss.

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este metapool contiene 3Crv (DAI, USDC y USDT) y RAI. Tenga en cuenta que, dado que el RAI no está vinculado a $1, este grupo puede estar sujeto a pérdidas temporales.

de.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu meta havuz, 3Crv (DAI, USDC ve USDT) ve RAI içerir. Lütfen RAI'nin 1$'a sabitlenmediğini unutmayın, bu havuzun kalıcı kayıplara maruz kalabileceğini unutmayın.

vi.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and RAI. Please be aware that as RAI is not pegged to $1, this pool may be subject to impermanent loss.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含 3Crv (DAI, USDC, USDT) 和 RAI。请注意 RAI 不锚定 $1，此流动性池存在无常损失的风险。

hi.description: यह टोकन Curve लिक्विडिटी पूल का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है। धारक पूल में व्यापार करने वाले उपयोगकर्ताओं से शुल्क कमाते हैं, और CRV उत्सर्जन अर्जित करने के लिए LP को Curve के गेज में भी जमा कर सकते हैं। इस मेटापूल में 3Crv (DAI, USDC, और USDT) और RAI शामिल हैं। कृपया ध्यान रखें कि चूंकि RAI $1 पर नहीं आंकी गई है, इसलिए यह पूल अस्थायी नुकसान के अधीन हो सकता है।
